001package wavelet;
002
003import java.awt.Color;
004import java.awt.GridLayout;
005import java.awt.Point;
006import java.awt.Graphics2D;
007import java.awt.image.BufferedImage;
008import java.awt.event.InputEvent;
009import java.awt.event.MouseEvent;
010import java.util.Arrays;
011import javax.swing.JPanel;
012import java.awt.event.KeyEvent;
013
014import condition.Condition;
015import condition.Interval;
016import condition.ValueHolder;
017import conditionalbranch.ConditionalBranch;
018import utility.ImageUtility;
019import utility.ColorUtility;
020
021/**
022 * ウェーブレット変換において、二次元データを扱うModelクラス。
023 */
024public class Wavelet2dModel extends WaveletModel
025{
026
027        /**
028         * 変換の対象となる二次元データの最大絶対値
029         */
030        protected double maximumAbsoluteSourceCoefficient = Double.MIN_VALUE;
031
032        /**
033         * 二次元データのスケーリング係数の最大絶対値
034         */
035        protected double maximumAbsoluteScalingCoefficient = Double.MIN_VALUE;
036
037        /**
038         * 二次元データのウェーブレット展開係数の最大絶対値
039         */
040        protected double maximumAbsoluteWaveletCoefficient = Double.MIN_VALUE;
041
042        /**
043         * 逆ウェーブレット変換をした二次元データの最大絶対値
044         */
045        protected double maximumAbsoluteRecomposedCoefficient = Double.MIN_VALUE;
046
047        /**
048         * 変換の対象となる二次元データのRGB配列
049         */
050        protected double[][][] sourceCoefficientsArray;
051
052        /**
053         * 二次元データのスケーリング係数のRGB配列
054         */
055        protected double[][][] scalingCoefficientsArray;
056
057        /**
058         * 水平ウェーブレット係数のRGB配列
059         */
060        protected double[][][] horizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray;
061
062        /**
063         * 垂直ウェーブレット係数のRGB配列
064         */
065        protected double[][][] verticalWaveletCoefficientsArray;
066
067        /**
068         * 対角ウェーブレット係数のRGB配列
069         */
070        protected double[][][] diagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray;
071
072        /**
073         * 対話的な操作後の水平ウェーブレット係数のRGB配列
074         */
075        protected double[][][] interactiveHorizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray;
076
077        /**
078         * 対話的な操作後の垂直ウェーブレット係数のRGB配列
079         */
080        protected double[][][] interactiveVerticalWaveletCoefficientsArray;
081
082        /**
083         * 対話的な操作後の対角ウェーブレット係数のRGB配列
084         */
085        protected double[][][] interactiveDiagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray;
086
087        /**
088         * 逆ウェーブレット変換をした二次元データのRGB配列
089         */
090        protected double[][][] recomposedCoefficientsArray;
091
092        /**
093         * 変換の対象となる二次元データを表示するViewに依存するModel。
094         */
095        protected WaveletPaneModel sourceCoefficientsPaneModel = null;
096
097        /**
098         * 二次元データのスケーリング係数を表示するViewに依存するModel。
099         */
100        protected WaveletPaneModel scalingAndWaveletCoefficientsPaneModel = null;
101
102        /**
103         * 対話的に編集するウェーブレット展開係数を表示するViewに依存するModel。
104         */
105        protected WaveletPaneModel interactiveScalingAndWaveletCoefficientsPaneModel = null;
106
107        /**
108         * 逆ウェーブレット変換をした二次元データを表示するViewに依存するModel。
109         */
110        protected WaveletPaneModel recomposedCoefficientsPaneModel = null;
111
112        /**
113         * ウィンドウの座標から、あるViewにおける座標に変換する。
114         * @param aPoint ウィンドウの座標。
115         * @param aInputEvent インプット・イベント。
116         */
117        public void computeFromPoint(Point aPoint, InputEvent aInputEvent)
118        {
119                new Condition(() -> { return aPoint != null; }).ifTrue(() -> {
120                        Interval<Integer> anInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < this.sourceCoefficientsArray.length; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
121                        anInterval.forEach((Integer index) -> {
122                                new Condition(() -> { return this.sourceCoefficientsArray[index] != null; }).ifTrue(() -> {
123                                        // スケーリング係数の画像の座標に相対的に変換する。
124                                        ValueHolder<Integer> xValue = new ValueHolder<>(aPoint.x % this.scalingCoefficientsArray[index].length);
125                                        ValueHolder<Integer> yValue = new ValueHolder<>(aPoint.y % this.scalingCoefficientsArray[index][0].length);
126
127                                        xValue.set(Math.max(Math.min(xValue.get(), this.scalingCoefficientsArray[index].length - 1), 0));
128                                        yValue.set(Math.max(Math.min(yValue.get(), this.scalingCoefficientsArray[index][0].length - 1), 0));
129                                        BufferedImage anImage = this.interactiveScalingAndWaveletCoefficientsPaneModel.picture();
130                                        int width = anImage.getWidth();
131                                        int height = anImage.getHeight();
132                                        // marginが小さいほど、変更範囲が広くなる。
133                                        int margin = 30;
134                                        Interval<Integer> xInterval = new Interval<Integer>(-(width / margin), (Integer it) -> { return it < width / margin; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
135                                        Interval<Integer> yInterval = new Interval<Integer>(-(height / margin), (Integer it) -> { return it < height / margin; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
136                                        xInterval.forEach((Integer xMargin) -> {
137                                                yInterval.forEach((Integer yMargin) -> {
138                                                        int x = Math.max(Math.min(xValue.get() + xMargin, this.scalingCoefficientsArray[index].length - 1), 0);
139                                                        int y = Math.max(Math.min(yValue.get() + yMargin, this.scalingCoefficientsArray[index][0].length - 1), 0);
140                                                        new ConditionalBranch(() -> { return aInputEvent.isAltDown(); }).ifThenElse(() -> {
141                                                                this.interactiveHorizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index][x][y] = 0.0d;
142                                                                this.interactiveVerticalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index][x][y] = 0.0d;
143                                                                this.interactiveDiagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index][x][y] = 0.0d; }, () -> {
144                                                                this.interactiveHorizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index][x][y] = this.horizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index][x][y];
145                                                                this.interactiveVerticalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index][x][y] = this.verticalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index][x][y];
146                                                                this.interactiveDiagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index][x][y] = this.diagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index][x][y]; });
147                                                });
148                                        });
149                                });
150                        });
151                });
152                this.computeRecomposedCoefficients();
153        }
154
155        /**
156         * スケーリング係数とウェーブレット展開係数からデータを復元する。
157         */
158        public void computeRecomposedCoefficients()
159        {
160                BufferedImage imageScalingCoefficientsArray = Wavelet2dModel.generateImage(this.scalingCoefficientsArray, maximumAbsoluteScalingCoefficient());
161                BufferedImage imageInteractiveHorizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray = Wavelet2dModel.generateImage(this.interactiveHorizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray, maximumAbsoluteWaveletCoefficient());
162                BufferedImage imageInteractiveVerticalWaveletCoefficientsArray = Wavelet2dModel.generateImage(this.interactiveVerticalWaveletCoefficientsArray, maximumAbsoluteWaveletCoefficient());
163                BufferedImage imageInteractiveDiagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray = Wavelet2dModel.generateImage(this.interactiveDiagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray, maximumAbsoluteWaveletCoefficient());
164                BufferedImage imageInteractiveScalingAndWaveletCoefficientsArray = Wavelet2dModel.generateImage(imageScalingCoefficientsArray, imageInteractiveHorizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray, imageInteractiveVerticalWaveletCoefficientsArray, imageInteractiveDiagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray);
165                this.interactiveScalingAndWaveletCoefficientsPaneModel.picture(imageInteractiveScalingAndWaveletCoefficientsArray);
166                this.interactiveScalingAndWaveletCoefficientsPaneModel.changed();
167
168                Interval<Integer> anInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < this.sourceCoefficientsArray.length; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
169                anInterval.forEach((Integer index) -> {
170                        new Condition(() -> { return this.sourceCoefficientsArray[index] != null; }).ifTrue(() -> {
171                                double[][][] waveletCoefficients = {this.interactiveHorizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index], this.interactiveVerticalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index], this.interactiveDiagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index]};
172                                DiscreteWavelet2dTransformation waveletTransformation = new DiscreteWavelet2dTransformation(this.scalingCoefficientsArray[index], waveletCoefficients);
173                                this.recomposedCoefficientsArray[index] = waveletTransformation.recomposedCoefficients();
174                        });
175                });
176                BufferedImage imageRecomposedCoefficientsArray = Wavelet2dModel.generateImage(this.recomposedCoefficientsArray, maximumAbsoluteRecomposedCoefficient());
177                this.recomposedCoefficientsPaneModel.picture(imageRecomposedCoefficientsArray);
178                this.recomposedCoefficientsPaneModel.changed();
179        }
180
181        /**
182         * 2次元のサンプルデータを返す。
183         * @return 2次元のサンプルデータ。
184         */
185        public static double[][] dataSampleCoefficients()
186        {
187                int size = 64;
188                double[][] aMatrix = new double[size][size];
189                for (double[] data : aMatrix)
190                {
191                        Arrays.fill(data, 0.2d);
192                }
193                Interval<Integer> anInterval = new Interval<Integer>(5, (Integer it) -> { return it < size - 5; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
194                anInterval.forEach((Integer index) -> {
195                        aMatrix[5][index] = 1.0d;
196                        aMatrix[size - 6][index] = 1.0d;
197                        aMatrix[index][5] = 1.0d;
198                        aMatrix[index][size - 6] = 1.0d;
199                        aMatrix[index][index] = 1.0d;
200                        aMatrix[index][size - index - 1] = 1.0d;
201                });
202                return aMatrix;
203        }
204
205        /**
206         * 離散ウェーブレット2次元変換のための元データ(Earth)。
207         * @return 3次元のdouble配列。
208         */
209        public static double[][][] dataEarth()
210        {
211                BufferedImage anImage = Wavelet2dModel.imageEarth();
212                return Wavelet2dModel.lrgbMatrixes(anImage);
213        }
214
215        /**
216         * 離散ウェーブレット2次元変換のための元データ(SmalltalkBalloon)。
217         * @return 3次元のdouble配列。
218         */
219        public static double[][][] dataSmalltalkBalloon()
220        {
221                BufferedImage anImage = Wavelet2dModel.imageSmalltalkBalloon();
222                return Wavelet2dModel.lrgbMatrixes(anImage);
223        }
224
225        /**
226         * 二次元配列に指定したデータを追加する。
227         * @param aMatrix データの追加先の配列。
228         * @param aValue 追加するデータ。
229         */
230        public static void fill(double[][] aMatrix, double aValue)
231        {
232                for (double[] data : aMatrix)
233                {
234                        double[] anArray = data;
235                        Arrays.fill(anArray, aValue);
236                }
237        }
238
239        /**
240         * 離散ウェーブレット2次元変換のためのデータ値(valueMatrixArray)を画像に変換して応答する。
241         * @param valueMatrixArray 色に関するデータも含む画像を表す3次元double配列。
242         * @param maxValue valueMatrixArrayの要素の最大値。
243         * @return 生成した画像。
244         */
245        public static BufferedImage generateImage(double[][][] valueMatrixArray, double maxValue)
246        {
247                double[][] valueMatrix = valueMatrixArray[0];
248                int width = valueMatrix.length;
249                int height = valueMatrix[0].length;
250                BufferedImage anImage = new BufferedImage(width, height, BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_RGB);
251                Graphics2D aGraphics = anImage.createGraphics();
252                Boolean aBoolean = new ConditionalBranch(() -> { return valueMatrixArray[1] == null; }).or(() -> { return valueMatrixArray[2] == null; });
253                Boolean anotherBoolean = new ConditionalBranch(() -> { return aBoolean; }).or(() -> { return valueMatrixArray[3] == null; });
254                Interval<Integer> yInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < height; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
255                Interval<Integer> xInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < width; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
256                new Condition(() -> { return anotherBoolean; }).ifThenElse(() -> {
257                        // Grayscale
258                        yInterval.forEach((Integer y) -> {
259                                xInterval.forEach((Integer x) -> {
260                                        double aValue = Math.abs(valueMatrix[x][y]);
261                                        int brightness = (int)Math.round((aValue / maxValue) * 255.0d);
262                                        Color aColor = new Color(brightness, brightness, brightness);
263                                        aGraphics.setColor(aColor);
264                                        aGraphics.fillRect(x, y, 1, 1);
265                                });
266                        }); }, () -> {
267                        // Color
268                        int[][] redMatrix = new int[width][height];
269                        int[][] greenMatrix = new int[width][height];
270                        int[][] blueMatrix = new int[width][height];
271                        yInterval.forEach((Integer y) -> {
272                                xInterval.forEach((Integer x) -> {
273                                        double redValue = Math.abs(valueMatrixArray[1][x][y]);
274                                        int red = (int)Math.round((redValue / maxValue) * 255.0d);
275                                        double greenValue = Math.abs(valueMatrixArray[2][x][y]);
276                                        int green = (int)Math.round((greenValue / maxValue) * 255.0d);
277                                        double blueValue = Math.abs(valueMatrixArray[3][x][y]);
278                                        int blue = (int)Math.round((blueValue / maxValue) * 255.0d);
279                                        Color aColor = new Color(red, green, blue);
280                                        aGraphics.setColor(aColor);
281                                        aGraphics.fillRect(x, y, 1, 1);
282                                });
283                        }); });
284
285                return anImage;
286        }
287
288        /**
289         * 離散ウェーブレット2次元変換のためのデータ値(valueMatrix)を画像に変換して応答する。
290         * @param valueMatrix 画像を表す2次元double配列。
291         * @param scaleFactor valueMatrixの長さに応じた画像の拡大幅。
292         * @param rgbFlag 応答する画像の色を表す値。Constantsクラスのフィールドに基づく。
293         * @return 生成した画像。
294         */
295        public static BufferedImage generateImage(double[][] valueMatrix, Point scaleFactor, int rgbFlag)
296        {
297                int width = valueMatrix.length;
298                int height = valueMatrix[0].length;
299                int w = width * scaleFactor.x;
300                int h = height * scaleFactor.y;
301                BufferedImage anImage = new BufferedImage(w, h, BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_RGB);
302                Graphics2D aGraphics = anImage.createGraphics();
303
304                ValueHolder<Double> maxValue = new ValueHolder<>(Double.MIN_VALUE);
305                Interval<Integer> yInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < height; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
306                Interval<Integer> xInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < width; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
307                yInterval.forEach((Integer y) -> {
308                        xInterval.forEach((Integer x) -> {
309                                double aValue = Math.abs(valueMatrix[x][y]);
310                                maxValue.set(Math.max(aValue, maxValue.get()));
311                        });
312                });
313                yInterval.forEach((Integer y) -> {
314                        xInterval.forEach((Integer x) -> {
315                                double aValue = Math.abs(valueMatrix[x][y]);
316                                int luminance = (int)Math.round((aValue / maxValue.get()) * 255.0d);
317                                ValueHolder<Color> aColor = new ValueHolder<>(new Color(luminance, luminance, luminance));
318                                new Condition(() -> { return rgbFlag == Constants.RED; }).ifTrue(() -> { aColor.set(new Color(luminance, 0, 0)); });
319                                new Condition(() -> { return rgbFlag == Constants.GREEN; }).ifTrue(() -> { aColor.set(new Color(0, luminance, 0)); });
320                                new Condition(() -> { return rgbFlag == Constants.BLUE; }).ifTrue(() -> { aColor.set(new Color(0, 0, luminance)); });
321                                aGraphics.setColor(aColor.get());
322                                aGraphics.fillRect(x * scaleFactor.x, y * scaleFactor.y, scaleFactor.x, scaleFactor.y);
323                        });
324                });
325
326                return anImage;
327        }
328
329        /**
330         * スケーリング係数の画像と水平、垂直、対角方向のウェーブレッと展開係数の画像を結合した画像を応答する。
331         * @param imageScalingCoefficients スケーリング係数の画像。
332         * @param imageHorizontalWaveletCoefficients 水平方向のウェーブレット展開係数の画像。
333         * @param imageVerticalWaveletCoefficients 垂直方向のウェーブレット展開係数の画像。
334         * @param imageDiagonalWaveletCoefficients 対角方向のウェーブレット展開係数の画像。
335         * @return 生成した画像。
336         */
337        public static BufferedImage generateImage(BufferedImage imageScalingCoefficients, BufferedImage imageHorizontalWaveletCoefficients, BufferedImage imageVerticalWaveletCoefficients, BufferedImage imageDiagonalWaveletCoefficients)
338        {
339                int w = imageScalingCoefficients.getWidth();
340                int h = imageScalingCoefficients.getHeight();
341                int width = w + imageHorizontalWaveletCoefficients.getWidth();
342                int height = h + imageVerticalWaveletCoefficients.getHeight();
343                BufferedImage anImage = new BufferedImage(width, height, BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_RGB);
344                Graphics2D aGraphics = anImage.createGraphics();
345                aGraphics.drawImage(imageScalingCoefficients, 0, 0, null);
346                aGraphics.drawImage(imageHorizontalWaveletCoefficients, w, 0, null);
347                aGraphics.drawImage(imageVerticalWaveletCoefficients, 0, h, null);
348                aGraphics.drawImage(imageDiagonalWaveletCoefficients, w, h, null);
349                return anImage;
350        }
351
352        /**
353         * 離散ウェーブレット2次元変換のための元データ(Earth)。
354         * @return Earthの画像。
355         */
356        public static BufferedImage imageEarth()
357        {
358                String aString = "SampleImages/imageEarth512x256.jpg";
359                return ImageUtility.readImage(aString);
360        }
361
362        /**
363         * 離散ウェーブレット2次元変換のための元データ(SmalltalkBalloon)。
364         * @return SmalltalkBalloonの画像。
365         */
366        public static BufferedImage imageSmalltalkBalloon()
367        {
368                String aString = "SampleImages/imageSmalltalkBalloon256x256.jpg";
369                return ImageUtility.readImage(aString);
370        }
371
372        /**
373         * 画像を輝度とRGBの3次元データに変換する。
374         * @param anImage 変換元の画像。
375         * @return 変換した3次元double配列。
376         */
377        public static double[][][] lrgbMatrixes(BufferedImage anImage)
378        {
379                int width = anImage.getWidth();
380                int height = anImage.getHeight();
381                double[][] luminanceMatrix = new double[width][height];
382                double[][] redMatrix = new double[width][height];
383                double[][] greenMatrix = new double[width][height];
384                double[][] blueMatrix = new double[width][height];
385                Interval<Integer> yInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < height; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
386                Interval<Integer> xInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < width; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
387                yInterval.forEach((Integer y) -> {
388                        xInterval.forEach((Integer x) -> {
389                                int aRGB = anImage.getRGB(x, y);
390                                luminanceMatrix[x][y] = ColorUtility.luminanceFromRGB(aRGB);
391                                double[] rgb = ColorUtility.convertINTtoRGB(aRGB);
392                                redMatrix[x][y] = rgb[0];
393                                greenMatrix[x][y] = rgb[1];
394                                blueMatrix[x][y] = rgb[2];
395                        });
396                });
397                return new double[][][] {luminanceMatrix, redMatrix, greenMatrix, blueMatrix};
398        }
399
400        /**
401         * sourceCoefficientsArrayフィールドの要素の最大値を設定して、応答する。
402         * @return sourceCoefficientsArrayフィールドの要素の最大値。
403         */
404        public double maximumAbsoluteSourceCoefficient()
405        {
406                this.maximumAbsoluteSourceCoefficient = Double.MIN_VALUE;
407                Interval<Integer> anInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < this.sourceCoefficientsArray.length; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
408                anInterval.forEach((Integer index) -> {
409                        new Condition(() -> { return this.sourceCoefficientsArray[index] != null; }).ifTrue(() -> {
410                                double[][] sourceCoefficients = this.sourceCoefficientsArray[index];
411                                Interval<Integer> xInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < sourceCoefficients.length; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
412                                Interval<Integer> yInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < sourceCoefficients[0].length; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
413                                xInterval.forEach((Integer x) -> {
414                                        yInterval.forEach((Integer y) -> {
415                                                this.maximumAbsoluteSourceCoefficient = Math.max(Math.abs(sourceCoefficients[x][y]), this.maximumAbsoluteSourceCoefficient);
416                                        });
417                                });
418                        });
419                });
420                return this.maximumAbsoluteSourceCoefficient;
421        }
422
423        /**
424         * scalingCoefficientsArrayフィールドの要素の最大値を設定して、応答する。
425         * @return scalingCoefficientsArrayフィールドの要素の最大値。
426         */
427        public double maximumAbsoluteScalingCoefficient()
428        {
429                this.maximumAbsoluteScalingCoefficient = Double.MIN_VALUE;
430                Interval<Integer> anInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < this.scalingCoefficientsArray.length; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
431                anInterval.forEach((Integer index) -> {
432                        new Condition(() -> { return this.scalingCoefficientsArray[index] != null; }).ifTrue(() -> {
433                                double[][] scalingCoefficients = this.scalingCoefficientsArray[index];
434                                Interval<Integer> xInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < scalingCoefficients.length; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
435                                Interval<Integer> yInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < scalingCoefficients[0].length; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
436                                xInterval.forEach((Integer x) -> {
437                                        yInterval.forEach((Integer y) -> {
438                                                this.maximumAbsoluteScalingCoefficient = Math.max(Math.abs(scalingCoefficients[x][y]), this.maximumAbsoluteScalingCoefficient);
439                                        });
440                                });
441                        });
442                });
443                return this.maximumAbsoluteScalingCoefficient;
444        }
445
446        /**
447         * horizontalWaveletCoefficientsArrayフィールド、verticalWaveletCoefficientsArrayフィールド、diagonalWaveletCoefficientsArrayフィールドの要素の最大値を設定して、応答する。
448         * @return ウェーブレット展開係数に関するフィールドの要素の最大値。
449         */
450        public double maximumAbsoluteWaveletCoefficient()
451        {
452                this.maximumAbsoluteWaveletCoefficient = Double.MIN_VALUE;
453                Interval<Integer> anInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < this.scalingCoefficientsArray.length; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
454                anInterval.forEach((Integer index) -> {
455                        new Condition(() -> { return this.horizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index] != null; }).ifTrue(() -> {
456                                double[][] horizontalWaveletCoefficients = this.horizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index];
457                                double[][] verticalWaveletCoefficients = this.verticalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index];
458                                double[][] diagonalWaveletCoefficients = this.diagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index];
459                                Interval<Integer> xInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < horizontalWaveletCoefficients.length; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
460                                Interval<Integer> yInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < horizontalWaveletCoefficients[0].length; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
461                                xInterval.forEach((Integer x) -> {
462                                        yInterval.forEach((Integer y) -> {
463                                                this.maximumAbsoluteWaveletCoefficient = Math.max(Math.abs(horizontalWaveletCoefficients[x][y]), this.maximumAbsoluteWaveletCoefficient);
464                                                this.maximumAbsoluteWaveletCoefficient = Math.max(Math.abs(verticalWaveletCoefficients[x][y]), this.maximumAbsoluteWaveletCoefficient);
465                                                this.maximumAbsoluteWaveletCoefficient = Math.max(Math.abs(diagonalWaveletCoefficients[x][y]), this.maximumAbsoluteWaveletCoefficient);
466                                        });
467                                });
468                        });
469                });
470                return this.maximumAbsoluteWaveletCoefficient;
471        }
472
473        /**
474         * recomposedCoefficientsArrayフィールドの要素の最大値を設定して、応答する。
475         * @return recomposedCoefficientsArrayフィールドの要素の最大値。
476         */
477        public double maximumAbsoluteRecomposedCoefficient()
478        {
479                this.maximumAbsoluteRecomposedCoefficient = Double.MIN_VALUE;
480                Interval<Integer> anInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < this.recomposedCoefficientsArray.length; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
481                anInterval.forEach((Integer index) -> {
482                        new Condition(() -> { return this.recomposedCoefficientsArray[index] != null; }).ifTrue(() -> {
483                                double[][] recomposedCoefficients = this.recomposedCoefficientsArray[index];
484                                Interval<Integer> xInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < recomposedCoefficients.length; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
485                                Interval<Integer> yInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < recomposedCoefficients[0].length; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
486                                xInterval.forEach((Integer x) -> {
487                                        yInterval.forEach((Integer y) -> {
488                                                this.maximumAbsoluteRecomposedCoefficient = Math.max(Math.abs(recomposedCoefficients[x][y]), this.maximumAbsoluteRecomposedCoefficient);
489                                        });
490                                });
491                        });
492                });
493                return this.maximumAbsoluteRecomposedCoefficient;
494        }
495
496        /**
497         * コンポーネント上でマウス・ボタンをクリック(押してから離す)したときに呼び出されます。
498         * @param aPoint マウスがクリックされた座標。
499         * @param aMouseEvent マウスイベント。
500         */
501        public void mouseClicked(Point aPoint, MouseEvent aMouseEvent)
502        {
503                this.computeFromPoint(aPoint, aMouseEvent);
504        }
505
506        /**
507         * コンポーネント上でマウス・ボタンを押してドラッグすると呼び出されます。
508         * @param aPoint マウスがクリックされた座標。
509         * @param aMouseEvent マウスイベント。
510         */
511        public void mouseDragged(Point aPoint, MouseEvent aMouseEvent)
512        {
513                this.computeFromPoint(aPoint, aMouseEvent);
514        }
515
516        /**
517         * ウィンドウを開く
518         */
519        public void open()
520        {
521                BufferedImage imageSourceCoefficientsArray = Wavelet2dModel.generateImage(this.sourceCoefficientsArray, maximumAbsoluteSourceCoefficient());
522                BufferedImage imageScalingCoefficientsArray = Wavelet2dModel.generateImage(this.scalingCoefficientsArray, maximumAbsoluteScalingCoefficient());
523                BufferedImage imageHorizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray = Wavelet2dModel.generateImage(this.horizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray, maximumAbsoluteWaveletCoefficient());
524                BufferedImage imageVerticalWaveletCoefficientsArray = Wavelet2dModel.generateImage(this.verticalWaveletCoefficientsArray, maximumAbsoluteWaveletCoefficient());
525                BufferedImage imageDiagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray = Wavelet2dModel.generateImage(this.diagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray, maximumAbsoluteWaveletCoefficient());
526                BufferedImage imageScalingAndWaveletCoefficientsArray = Wavelet2dModel.generateImage(imageScalingCoefficientsArray, imageHorizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray, imageVerticalWaveletCoefficientsArray, imageDiagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray);
527                BufferedImage imageInteractiveHorizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray = Wavelet2dModel.generateImage(this.interactiveHorizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray, maximumAbsoluteWaveletCoefficient());
528                BufferedImage imageInteractiveVerticalWaveletCoefficientsArray = Wavelet2dModel.generateImage(this.interactiveVerticalWaveletCoefficientsArray, maximumAbsoluteWaveletCoefficient());
529                BufferedImage imageInteractiveDiagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray = Wavelet2dModel.generateImage(this.interactiveDiagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray, maximumAbsoluteWaveletCoefficient());
530                BufferedImage imageInteractiveScalingAndWaveletCoefficientsArray = Wavelet2dModel.generateImage(imageScalingCoefficientsArray, imageInteractiveHorizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray, imageInteractiveVerticalWaveletCoefficientsArray, imageInteractiveDiagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray);
531                BufferedImage imageRecomposedCoefficientsArray = Wavelet2dModel.generateImage(this.recomposedCoefficientsArray, maximumAbsoluteRecomposedCoefficient());
532
533                // ウィンドウの全体のレイアウト
534                GridLayout windowLayout = new GridLayout(2, 2);
535                // ウィンドウの全体のパネル
536                JPanel windowPanel = new JPanel(windowLayout);
537
538                WaveletPaneView aView;
539
540                // 左上
541                this.sourceCoefficientsPaneModel = new WaveletPaneModel(imageSourceCoefficientsArray, "Source Coefficients");
542                aView = new WaveletPaneView(this.sourceCoefficientsPaneModel);
543                windowPanel.add(aView);
544
545                // 右上
546                this.scalingAndWaveletCoefficientsPaneModel = new WaveletPaneModel(imageScalingAndWaveletCoefficientsArray, "Scaling & Wavelet Coefficients");
547                aView = new WaveletPaneView(this.scalingAndWaveletCoefficientsPaneModel);
548                windowPanel.add(aView);
549
550                // 左下
551                this.recomposedCoefficientsPaneModel = new WaveletPaneModel(imageRecomposedCoefficientsArray, "Recomposed Coefficients");
552                aView = new WaveletPaneView(this.recomposedCoefficientsPaneModel);
553                windowPanel.add(aView);
554
555                // 右下
556                this.interactiveScalingAndWaveletCoefficientsPaneModel = new WaveletPaneModel(imageInteractiveScalingAndWaveletCoefficientsArray, "Interactive Scaling & Wavelet Coefficients", this);
557                WaveletPaneController aController = new WaveletPaneController();
558                aView = new WaveletPaneView(this.interactiveScalingAndWaveletCoefficientsPaneModel, aController);
559                aController.enableKeyListener();
560                windowPanel.add(aView);
561
562                Example2d.open(windowPanel, 512, 512);
563        }
564
565        /**
566         * 変換の対象となる二次元データを設定する。
567         * @param sourceDataMatrix 設定する二次元データ
568         */
569        public void setSourceData(double[][] sourceDataMatrix)
570        {
571                this.setSourceData(new double[][][] {sourceDataMatrix, null, null, null});
572        }
573
574        /**
575         * 変換の対象となる輝度とRGBの3次元データを設定する。
576         * @param soueceDataMatrixArray 設定する輝度とRGBの3次元データ
577         */
578        public void setSourceData(double[][][] soueceDataMatrixArray)
579        {
580                this.sourceCoefficientsArray = soueceDataMatrixArray;
581                this.scalingCoefficientsArray = new double[this.sourceCoefficientsArray.length][][];
582                this.horizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray = new double[this.sourceCoefficientsArray.length][][];
583                this.verticalWaveletCoefficientsArray = new double[this.sourceCoefficientsArray.length][][];
584                this.diagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray = new double[this.sourceCoefficientsArray.length][][];
585                this.interactiveHorizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray = new double[this.sourceCoefficientsArray.length][][];
586                this.interactiveVerticalWaveletCoefficientsArray = new double[this.sourceCoefficientsArray.length][][];
587                this.interactiveDiagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray = new double[this.sourceCoefficientsArray.length][][];
588                this.recomposedCoefficientsArray = new double[this.sourceCoefficientsArray.length][][];
589                Interval<Integer> anInterval = new Interval<Integer>(0, (Integer it) -> { return it < this.sourceCoefficientsArray.length; }, (Integer it) -> { it++; return it; });
590                anInterval.forEach((Integer index) -> {
591                        new Condition(() -> { return this.sourceCoefficientsArray[index] != null; }).ifTrue(() -> {
592                                double[][] sourceCoefficients = this.sourceCoefficientsArray[index];
593                                DiscreteWavelet2dTransformation waveletTransformation = new DiscreteWavelet2dTransformation(sourceCoefficients);
594                                this.scalingCoefficientsArray[index] = waveletTransformation.scalingCoefficients();
595                                this.horizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index] = waveletTransformation.horizontalWaveletCoefficients();
596                                this.verticalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index] = waveletTransformation.verticalWaveletCoefficients();
597                                this.diagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index] = waveletTransformation.diagonalWaveletCoefficients();
598                                this.interactiveHorizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index] = new double[this.horizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index].length][this.horizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index][0].length];
599                                this.interactiveVerticalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index] = new double[this.verticalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index].length][this.verticalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index][0].length];
600                                this.interactiveDiagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index] = new double[this.diagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index].length][this.diagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index][0].length];
601                                Wavelet2dModel.fill(this.interactiveHorizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index], 0.0d);
602                                Wavelet2dModel.fill(this.interactiveVerticalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index], 0.0d);
603                                Wavelet2dModel.fill(this.interactiveDiagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index], 0.0d);
604                                double[][][] waveletCoefficients = {this.interactiveHorizontalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index], this.interactiveVerticalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index], this.interactiveDiagonalWaveletCoefficientsArray[index]};
605                                DiscreteWavelet2dTransformation anotherWaveletTransformation = new DiscreteWavelet2dTransformation(this.scalingCoefficientsArray[index], waveletCoefficients);
606                                this.recomposedCoefficientsArray[index] = anotherWaveletTransformation.recomposedCoefficients();
607                        });
608                });
609        }
610
611        /**
612         * キーがタイプされたときに呼び出されます。
613         * @param e キー・イベント
614         */
615        public void keyPressed(KeyEvent e)
616        {
617                Boolean aBoolean = new ConditionalBranch(() -> { return Integer.valueOf(e.getKeyCode()).equals(Integer.valueOf(KeyEvent.VK_S)); }).and(() -> { return e.isMetaDown(); });
618                new Condition(() -> { return aBoolean; }).ifTrue(() -> { Example2d.write(this.recomposedCoefficientsPaneModel.picture()); });
619        }
620}
